name: x-extendee
description:
Element providing solution to no problem in particular.

##### Example

    <x-extendee></x-extendee>
blurb: Element providing solution to no problem in particular.

attributes.name: wizard
attributes.description: The `wizard` attribute sets an initial wizard

properties.name: lame
properties.description: `lame` is a property that does something lame.

methods.name: fireLasers
methods.description:
The `fireLasers` method will fire the lasers. At least
it will dispatch an event that claims lasers were fired :)

events.name: x-extendee-lasers-fail
events.description:
The `x-extendee-lasers-fail` event is fired whenever we
call fireLasers.
